subject: SESSION SUMMARY - Multiple tasks in progress
body:
## SESSION SUMMARY - Jan 15, 2026

### TASK 1: Venue Geocoding Architecture Overhaul
**Status**: Frontend changes DONE, waiting on backend teams
**Branch**: feature/venue-geocoding-overhaul (on DEVL)
**Commit**: e24365a

**What was done:**
1. Analyzed venue creation errors (geocoding 400, check-proximity 404, save 500)
2. Created coordinated plan to move geocoding from BE (Nominatim) to AF (Google)
3. Sent messages to Ben (fix check-proximity) and Fulton (create /api/venues/geocode on AF)
4. Added frontend controls:
   - 'Search Near Me' toggle (disable proximity bias in search)
   - 'Proximity Check' toggle with warning dialog
   - Warning logs override with user email + timestamp
5. Changes in: src/app/components/Modals/Venues/VenueModalAddWithSearch.js

**Waiting on:**
- Ben: Fix /api/venues/check-proximity endpoint
- Fulton: Create /api/venues/geocode on Azure Functions
- Then Sarah updates FE to call AF instead of BE for geocoding

---

### TASK 2: Featured Image Display in Calendar Views
**Status**: Code pushed to TEST, but Vercel deployment NOT showing changes
**Branch**: TEST
**Commit**: ef22534

**What was done:**
1. Added featuredImage display for events where isFeatured=true AND featuredImage exists
2. Updated 4 views:
   - TangoTiempo monthly view (page.js)
   - TangoTiempo list view (page.js)
   - Boston monthly view (boston/page.js)
   - Boston list view (boston/page.js)
3. Image shows as Row 3 below title:
   - Monthly: max 30px height, centered
   - List: max 40px height, 120px width, left-aligned
4. Graceful error handling (image hides on load error)

**Test Event:**
- ID: 696940e056452327838c0865
- Title: NEW!! MILONGA : BAILAMOS!
- isFeatured: true
- featuredImage: bialamos3.png
- URL: https://test.tangotiempo.com/event/696940e056452327838c0865
- Event data confirmed in TEST backend âœ“

**Problem:**
- Vercel deployment to TEST not showing new code
- Need to verify Vercel actually deployed commit ef22534
- Check Vercel dashboard or trigger manual redeploy

---

### TASK 3: Merge Plan
Once featured image is verified working:
1. Merge feature/venue-geocoding-overhaul from DEVL to TEST
2. Test both features together
3. Then merge TEST to PROD

---

### GIT STATUS
- TEST branch: commit ef22534 (featuredImage changes)
- DEVL branch: has feature/venue-geocoding-overhaul stashed
- feature/venue-geocoding-overhaul: commit e24365a (proximity/search toggles)

### NEXT STEPS
1. Check Vercel dashboard - verify TEST deployment
2. If not deployed, trigger manual redeploy
3. Verify featuredImage appears on calendar
4. Merge venue geocoding changes
5. Wait for Ben/Fulton backend work
